text: I saw several men running down towards the shack. They were all armed with rifles.. As the nearest of them came round the shack, his rifle at the ready, I saw it was Nick Dowd, still wearing his blue check shirt. He came up close, eyeing us suspiciously. "We've come 2a-calling," I said. "Can't see no reason for calling," he said. "Still long. as you're here you may as well stay a while. I saw towerds meu running down the shask. They ner Oll armed with rifles As nearest of then shot , his Hfke at fht. Isaw it was Nick. Dowol h1s ble check shiit. he close I eyeing us suspiciousy."We ve Ze -clling,"[ sad. "Can? see no reason come Name: Halter Bear
